 2013-08762013-07-18CIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) reduce the risk that Canadians and permanent residents might be excluded from job opportunities by restricting employers from requiring languages other than French or English for offers of employment to Temporary Foreign Workers; (2) provide for an exception where employers can demonstrate that they require languages other than French or English for performing the duties associated with the employment; and (3) protect Canadaâ€™s food security by exempting the Seasonal Agricultural Worker Program and other primary agricultural occupations from the new language restrictions, as there are proven acute labour shortages in this industry and the unfilled jobs are seasonal in nature.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0150 Publication Date: 2013-07-31
AttachmentsAttachment
